A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can’t be perceived in this manner.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The ulitharid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Psionic Hub
traits.desc: If an elder brain establishes a psychic link with the ulitharid, the elder brain can form a psychic link with any other creature the ulitharid can detect using its Creature Sense. Any such link ends if the creature falls outside the telepathy ranges of both the ulitharid and the elder brain. The ulitharid can maintain its psychic link with the elder brain regardless of the distance between them, so long as they are both on the same plane of existence. lithe ulitharid is more than 5 miles away from the elder brain, it can end the psychic link at any time (no action required).

spells: The ulitharid’s innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: detect thoughts, levitate
1/day each: confusion, dominate monster, eyebite, feeblemind, mass suggestion, plane shift (self only), project image, scrying, telekinesis

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 27 (4d10+5) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 14) and must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the ulitharid. Hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ulitharid kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The ulitharid magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or take 31 (4d12+5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Vargouille
monsters.languages: understands Abyssal, Infernal, and any languages it knew before becoming a vargouille but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Kiss
actions.desc: The vargouille kisses one incapacitated humanoid within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or become cursed. The cursed target loses 1 point of Charisma after each hour, as its head takes on fiendish aspects. The curse doesn’t advance while the target is in sunlight or the area of a daylight spell; don’t count that time. When the cursed target’s Charisma becomes 2, it dies, and its head tears from its body and becomes a new vargouille. Casting remove curse, greater restoration, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

actions.name: Stunning Shriek
actions.desc: The vargouille shrieks. Each humanoid and beast within 30 feet of the vargouille and able to hear it must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the vargouille’s next turn. While frightened in this way, a target is stunned. If a target’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for ft., the target is immune to the Stunning Shriek of all vargouilles for 1 hour.

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.desc: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The vegepygmy regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the vegepygmy’s next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn’t regenerate.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vegepygmy makes two attacks with its claws or two melee attacks with its spear.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage, or 6 (id8+2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Spores (1/Day)
actions.desc: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vegepygmy. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area that isn’t a plant must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 9 (2d8) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The velociraptor makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage.

monsters.name: War Priest
spells: The priest is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): divine favor, guiding bolt, healing word, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, magic weapon, prayer of healing, silence, spiritual weapon
3rd level (3 slots): beacon of hope, crusader’s mantle, dispel magic, revivify, spirit guardians, water wall
4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith, stoneskin
5th level (1 slot): flame strike, mass cure wounds, hold monster

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The priest makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 +3) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Guided Strike (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: The priest grants a +10 bonus to an attack roll made by itself or another creature within 30 feet of it. The priest can make this choice after the roll is made but before it hits or misses.

monsters.name: Warlock of the Archfey
spells: The warlock’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:
At will: disguise self, mage armor (self only), silent image, speak with animals
1/day: conjure fey

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, the warlock turns invisible and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

monsters.name: Warlock of the Fiend
monsters.damage_resistances: slashing damage from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
monsters.languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal)

traits.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll’s effects occur.

spells: The warlock’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:
At will: alter self, false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only), silent image
1/day each: feeblemind, finger of death, plane shift

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

monsters: Warlock of the Great Old One

monsters.name: Warlock of the Great Old One

traits.name: Whispering Aura
traits.desc: At the start of each of the warlock’s turns, each creature of its choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage, provided that the warlock isn’t incapacitated.

spells: The warlock’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, jump, levitate, mage armor (self only), speak with dead
1/day each: arcane gate, true seeing

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
traits.desc: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

traits.name: Survivor
traits.desc: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warlord makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 it, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary_actions.desc: The warlord can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The warlord regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Weapon Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The warlord makes a weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Command Ally
legendary_actions.desc: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can see and hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The warlord targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of warlord’s next turn.

monsters.name: White Guard Drake
monsters.languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

traits.name: Source
traits.desc: Volo's Guide to Monsters, p. 158

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Magic Club
traits.desc: In the wood woad’s hand, its club is magical and deals 7 (3d4) extra damage (included in its attacks).

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.desc: The wood woad has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The wood woad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is in contact with the ground. If the wood woad takes fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the wood woad’s next turn. The wood woad dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn’t regenerate.

traits.name: Tree Stride
traits.desc: Once on each of its turns, the wood woad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living tree within 5 feet of it and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of it that it can see, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wood woad makes two attacks with its club.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d4+4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Low Cunning
traits.desc: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Overbearing Pack
traits.desc: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart’s allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

traits.name: Raxivort's Tongue
traits.desc: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Xvart Speaker
monsters.languages: Abyssal plus one other language, usually Common or Goblin

monsters.name: Xvart Warlock of Raxivort

traits.name: Low Cunning
traits.desc: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Overbearing Pack
traits.desc: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart’s allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

traits.name: Raxivort's Tongue
traits.desc: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

spells: The xvart's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. it can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: detect magic, mage armor (self only)

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Yeth Hound
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
monsters.languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The yeth hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Sunlight Banishment
traits.desc: If the yeth hound starts its turn in sunlight, it is transported to the Ethereal Plane. While sunlight shines on the spot from which it vanished, the hound must remain in the Deep Ethereal. After sunset, it returns to the Border Ethereal at the same spot, whereupon it typically sets out to find its pack or its master. The hound is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, but it can’t affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. Once it is adjacent to its master or a pack mate that is on the Material Plane, a yeth hound in the Border Ethereal can return to the Material Plane as an action.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: While the yeth hound is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage if the target is frightened.

actions.name: Baleful Baying
actions.desc: The yeth hound bays magically. Every enemy within 300 feet of the hound that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the hound’s next turn or until the hound is incapacitated. A frightened target that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hound must use all its movement on that turn to get as far from the hound as possible, must finish the move before taking an action, and must take the most direct route, even if hazards lie that way. A target that successfully saves is immune to the baying of all yeth hounds for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Yuan-ti Anathema

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The anathema has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Ophidiophobia Aura
traits.desc: Any creature of the anathema’s choice, other than a snake or a yuan-ti, that starts its turn within 30 feet of the anathema and can see or hear it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of snakes and yuan-ti. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The anathema can use its action to polymorph into a Huge giant constrictor snake, or back into its true form. its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

traits.name: Six Heads
traits.desc: The anathema has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded. charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Variant: Acid Slime
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the yuan-ti can coat its body in a slimy acid that lasts for 1 minute. A creature that touches the yuan-ti, hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, or is hit by its constrict attack takes 5 (1d10) acid damage.

traits.name: Variant: Chameleon Skin
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Variant: Shed Skin (1/Day)
traits.desc: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

spells: The anathema’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: animal friendship (snakes only)
3/day each: darkness, entangle, fear, haste, suggestion, polymorph
1/day: divine word

actions.name: Multiattack (Anathema Form Only)
actions.desc: The anathema makes two claw attacks, one constrict attack, and one Flurry of Bites attack.

actions.name: Claw (Anathema Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6+6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 16 (3d6+6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 16 (3d6+6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns, and the anathema can’t constrict another target.

actions.name: Flurry of Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 27 (6d6+6) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

traits.name: Mental Resistance
traits.desc: The broodguard has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t paralyze it.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the broodguard can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Variant: Chameleon Skin
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Variant: Shed Skin (1/Day)
traits.desc: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The broodguard makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Yuan-ti Mind Whisperer

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. If it dies, it stays in its current form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Mind Fangs (2/Day)
traits.desc: The first time the yuan-ti hits with a melee attack on its turn, it can deal an extra 16 (3d10) psychic damage to the target.

traits.name: Sseth’s Blessing
traits.desc: When the yuan-ti reduces an enemy to 0 hit points, the yuan-ti gains 9 temporary hit points.

traits.name: Variant: Chameleon Skin
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Variant: Shed Skin (1/Day)
traits.desc: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

spells: The yuan-ti’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: animal friendship (snakes only)
3/day: suggestion

actions.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes one bite attack and one scimitar attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Yuan-ti Nightmare Speaker

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. If it dies, it stays in its current form.

traits.name: Death Fangs (2/Day)
traits.desc: The first time the yuan-ti hits with a melee attack on its turn, it can deal an extra 16 (3d10) necrotic damage to the target.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Variant: Chameleon Skin
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Variant: Shed Skin (1/Day)
traits.desc: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

spells: The yuan-ti’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: animal friendship (snakes only) 3/day: suggestion

actions.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes one constrict attack and one scimitar attack.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the yuan-ti can’t constrict another target.

actions.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Invoke Nightmare (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The yuan-ti taps into the nightmares of a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates an illusory, immobile manifestation of the creature’s deepest fears, visible only to that creature. The target must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 11 (2d10) psychic damage and is frightened of the manifestation, believing it to be real. The yuan-ti must concentrate to maintain the illusion (as if concentrating on a spell), which lasts for up to 1 minute and can’t be harmed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the illusion on a success, or taking 11 (2d10) psychic damage on a failure.

monsters.name: Yuan-ti Pit Master

traits.desc: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Poison’s Disciple (2/Day)
traits.desc: The first time the yuan-ti hits with a melee attack on its turn, it can deal an extra 16 (3d10) poison damage to the target.

traits.name: Variant: Chameleon Skin
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

spells: The yuan-ti’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: animal friendship (snakes only) 3/day: suggestion

actions.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes two bite attacks using its snake arms.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Merrshaulk's Slumber (1/Day)
actions.desc: The yuan-ti targets up to five creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or fall into a magical sleep and be unconscious for 10 minutes. A sleeping target awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake. This magical sleep has no effect on a creature immune to being charmed.

monsters.name: Aberrant Spirit
monsters.languages: Deep Speech, understands the languages you speak

traits.name: Regeneration (Slaad Only)
traits.desc: The aberration regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

traits.name: Whispering Aura (Star Spawn Only)
traits.desc: At the start of each of the aberration's turns, each creature within 5 feet of the aberration must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or take 2d6 psychic damage, provided that the aberration isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Eye Ray (Beholderkin Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel psychic damage.

actions.name: Claws (Slaad Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the aberration's next turn.

actions.name: Psychic Slam (Star Spawn Only)
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel psychic damage.

monsters.name: Abyssal Chicken
monsters.speed: 30 ft., fly 30 ft. (see bad flier below)
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 9

traits.name: Bad Flier
traits.desc: The abyssal chicken falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abyssal chicken makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Adult Red Dracolich
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 23

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The dracolich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dracolich can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dracolich's choice that is within 120 feet of the dracolich and aware of it must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolich's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dracolich exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 (18d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolich must succeed on a 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dracolich can then fly up to half its flying speed.

monsters.name: Animated Object (Huge)
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: Animated
traits.desc:
If the object lacks legs or other appendages it can use for locomotion, it instead has a flying speed of 30 feet and can hover. If the object is securely attached to a surface or larger object, such as a chain bolted to a wall, its speed is 0.
When the animated object drops to 0 hit points, it reverts to its original object form, and any remaining damage carries over to its original object form.
The DM might rule that a specific objects slam attack inflicts slashing or piercing damage based on its form.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a maul attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Primal Bond
traits.desc: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 2 + PB slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The beast can breathe both air and water.

traits.desc: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Binding Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 2 + PB piercing damage or 1d6 + 2 + PB bludgeoning damage (your choice), and the target is grappled (escape DC equal to your spellcasting save DC). Until this grapple ends, the beast can't use this attack on another target.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

monsters.name: Bestial Spirit
monsters.speed: 30 ft., climb 30 ft. (land only), fly 60 ft. (air only), swim 30 ft. (water only)

traits.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
traits.desc: The beast can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Flyby (Air Only)
traits.desc: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
traits.desc: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel piercing damage.

monsters.name: Black Gauntlet of Bane

traits.name: Aura of Terror
traits.desc: When a hostile creature within 5 feet of the black gauntlet makes an attack roll or a saving throw, it has disadvantage on the roll. Creatures that are immune to the frightened condition are immune to this trait.

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
traits.desc: The black gauntlet has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The black gauntlet makes two attacks with its mace.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Guiding Bolt (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 14 (4d6) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of the black gauntlet's next turn has advantage. If the black gauntlet casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

spells: The black gauntlet is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.1st level (4 slots): bane, bless, cure wounds, guiding bolt (see "Actions" below)

traits.name: Adhesive
traits.desc: The bone whelk can cause Medium or smaller objects to adhere to it. A Medium or smaller creature that touches the bone whelk is grappled by it (escape 10).

traits.name: Death Scream
traits.desc: When the bone whelk dies, it emits a blood-curdling shriek than can be heard out to a range of 120 feet. This shriek causes nonmagical, organic material within 10 feet of the bone whelk to rot. Each creature within 10 feet of the bone whelk when it dies takes 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The bone whelk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Celestial Spirit
monsters.languages: Celestial, understands the languages you speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The celestial makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Radiant Bow (Avenger Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 2d6 + 2 + summonSpellLevel radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Mace (Defender Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel radiant damage, and the celestial can choose itself or another creature it can see within 10 feet of the target. The chosen creature gains 1d10 temporary hit points.

actions.name: Healing Touch (1/Day)
actions.desc: The celestial touches another creature. The target magically regains hit points equal to 2d8 + summonSpellLevel.

monsters.name: Construct Spirit
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Heated Body (Metal Only)
traits.desc: A creature that touches the construct or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 1d10 fire damage.

traits.name: Stony Lethargy (Stone Only)
traits.desc: When a creature the construct can see starts its turn within 10 feet of the construct, the construct can force it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the target can't use reactions and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The construct makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Berserk Lashing (Clay Only)
reactions.desc: When the construct takes damage, it makes a slam attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the construct moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Irrepressible Dance
traits.desc: When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the item, the item can increase or decrease (your choice) the walking speed of that creature by 10 feet until the end of the turn, provided the item isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Force-Empowered Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. 1d10 + PB force damage.

traits.name: Aura of Murder
traits.desc: As long as the death's head is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The death's head has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The death's head uses Stunning Gaze and makes two dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stunning Gaze
actions.desc: The death's head targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Unstoppable (3/Day)
reactions.desc: The death's head reduces the damage it takes from an attack to 0.

monsters.name: Dryad Spirit
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Detect Life
traits.desc: The dryad can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The dryad can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

actions.name: Corrupting Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Horrifying Visage
actions.desc: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the dryad that can see her must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the dryad is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the dryad's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Wail (1/Day)
actions.desc: The dryad releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Elemental Spirit
monsters.speed: 40 ft., burrow 40 ft. (earth only), fly 40 ft. (air only hover), swim 40 ft. (water only)
monsters.damage_resistances: lightning, thunder (Air only), piercing, slashing (Earth only), acid (Water only)
monsters.languages: Primordial, understands the languages you speak

traits.name: Amorphous Form (Air, Fire, and Water Only)
traits.desc: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elemental makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 4 + summonSpellLevel bludgeoning damage (Air, Earth, and Water only) or fire damage (Fire only).

monsters.name: Fey Spirit
monsters.languages: Sylvan, understands the languages you speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel piercing damage + 1d6 force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step
bonus_actions.desc: The fey magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Then one of the following effects occurs, based on the fey's chosen mood:

bonus_actions.name: Fuming
bonus_actions.desc: The fey has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

bonus_actions.name: Mirthful
bonus_actions.desc: The fey can force one creature it can see within 10 feet of it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. Unless the save succeeds, the target is charmed by you and the fey for 1 minute or until the target takes any damage.

bonus_actions.name: Tricksy
bonus_actions.desc: The fey can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with magical darkness, which lasts until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Fiendish Flesh Golem
monsters.damage_immunities: lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine or silvered
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Berserk
traits.desc: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 100 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. If the golem's creator is within 60 feet of the berserk golem, the creator can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 100 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

traits.desc: The fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

A creature takes 2d10 + summonSpellLevel fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Devil's Sight (Devil Only)
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fiend's darkvision.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Bite (Demon Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws (Yugoloth Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel slashing damage. Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the fiend can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Hurl Flame (Devil Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. 2d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
traits.desc: The fist of Bane has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Flying Dagger
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 7

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The dagger is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the dagger must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the dagger remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Hellwasp
monsters.languages: Infernal, telepathy 300 ft. (with other hellwasps only)

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The hellwasp's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hellwasp makes two attacks: one with its sting and one with its sword talons.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Sword Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

monsters.name: Hollyphant
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Aura of Invulnerability
traits.desc: An invisible aura forms a 10-foot-radius sphere around the hollyphant for as long as it lives. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or objects within it, even if the spell is cast using a higher level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them. Similarly, the area within the barrier is excluded from the areas affected by such spells. The hollyphant can use an action to suppress this trait until its {@status concentration} ends (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The hollyphant's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Tusks
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Trumpet (3/Day)
actions.desc: The hollyphant blows air through its trunk, creating a trumpet sound that can be heard out to a range of 600 feet. The trumpet also creates a 30-foot cone of energy that has one of the following effects, chosen by the hollyphant:

actions.name: Trumpet of Blasting
actions.desc: Each creature in the cone must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 17 (5d6) thunder damage and is deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't deafened. Nonmagical objects in the cone that aren't being held or worn take 35 (10d6) thunder damage.

actions.name: Trumpet of Sparkles
actions.desc: Creatures in the cone must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d8 + 4) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Evil creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw. Good creatures in the cone take no damage.

spells: The hollyphant's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.2/day each: bless, cure wounds, protection from evil and good

spells.1/day each: banishment, heal, raise dead, shapechange (into a golden-furred mammoth with feathered wings and a flying speed of 120 ft.), teleport (with no chance of error)

monsters.name: Homunculus Servant
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the homunculus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

actions.name: Force Strike
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 30 ft., one target you can see. 1d4 + PB force damage.

reactions.name: Channel Magic
reactions.desc: The homunculus delivers a spell you cast that has a range of touch. The homunculus must be within 120 feet of you.

monsters.name: Incubus
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Eberron: Rising from the Last War
Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has charmed. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Charm
actions.desc:
One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only one target charmed at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

actions.name: Draining Kiss
actions.desc: The fiend kisses a creature charmed by it or a willing creature. The target must make a 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 (5d10 + 5) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.desc: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
traits.desc: The iron consul has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The iron consul makes one attack with its spear and can use its Voice of Command ability.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Voice of Command
actions.desc: The iron consul selects up to two allies within 90 feet of it that can hear its commands. Each ally can immediately use its reaction to make one melee attack.

traits.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
traits.desc: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The mimic can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

actions.name: Shape-Shift
actions.desc: The mimic polymorphs into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

monsters.name: Kuo-toa
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Otherworldly Perception
traits.desc: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

traits.name: Slippery
traits.desc: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Net
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. The target is restrained. A creature can use its action to make a 10 Strength check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

reactions.name: Sticky Shield
reactions.desc: When a creature misses the kuo-toa with a melee weapon attack, the kuo-toa uses its sticky shield to catch the weapon. The attacker must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw, or the weapon becomes stuck to the kuo-toa's shield. If the weapon's wielder can't or won't let go of the weapon, the wielder is grappled while the weapon is stuck. While stuck, the weapon can't be used. A creature can pull the weapon free by taking an action to make a 11 Strength check and succeeding.

monsters.name: Kuo-toa Archpriest
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Otherworldly Perception
traits.desc: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

traits.name: Slippery
traits.desc: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kuo-toa makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Scepter
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The kuo-toa is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, sanctuary, shield of faith

actions.desc: The kuo-toa makes one bite attack and two unarmed strikes.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the end of the kuo-toa's next turn.

monsters.name: Kuo-toa Whip

spells: The kuo-toa is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:

monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

traits.name: Skewer
traits.desc: Once per turn, when the lizardfolk makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage, and the lizardfolk gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws

actions.name: Trident

traits.name: Hold Breath

traits.name: Skewer

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws

actions.name: Trident

monsters.name: Master of Souls

traits.name: Grave Magic
traits.desc: When the master of souls cast a spell that deals damage, it can change the spell's damage type to necrotic.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The master of souls attacks twice with its flail.

actions.name: Silvered Skull Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the master of souls' next turn.

actions.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 13 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the master of souls' next turn. If the target is undead, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the master of souls for the same duration.

actions.name: Ray of Sickness (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the master of souls' next turn. If the master of souls casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

actions.name: Scorching Ray (2nd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target per ray (3 rays if a 2nd-level spell slot is used, 4 rays if a 3rd-level spell slot is used). 7 (2d6) fire damage per ray.

spells: The master of souls is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch (see "Actions" below), mage hand, message, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): burning hands, detect magic, ray of sickness (see "Actions" below), shield

spells.2nd level (3 slots): darkness, misty step, scorching ray (see "Actions" below)

monsters.name: Mighty Servant of Leuk-o
monsters.damage_immunities: acid, bludgeoning, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, stunned, unconscious
monsters.languages: understands the languages of creatures attuned to it but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Existence
traits.desc: The servant is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form or send it to another plane of existence.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The servant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and spell attacks made against it have disadvantage.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The servant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it is reduced to 0 hit points, this trait doesn't function until an attuned creature spends 24 hours repairing the artifact or until the artifact is subjected to lightning damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The servant's long jump is up to 50 feet and its high jump is up to 25 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The servant doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Destructive Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage. If the target is an object, it takes triple damage.

actions.name: Crushing Leap
actions.desc: If the servant jumps at least 25 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures is pushed to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the servant and must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 26 (4d12) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

actions.name: Skull Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Claws of the Grave
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Necrotic Centipede
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Necrotic Body
traits.desc: A creature that touches the centipede or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 40 (6d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the centipede can't bite another target.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc:
The centipede makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the centipede, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the centipede's turns.
If the centipede takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the centipede must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the centipede. If the centipede dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

traits.name: Aura of Murder
traits.desc: As long as the night blade is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.desc: The peacock has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The peacock has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the peacock's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Reaper of Bhaal

traits.name: Aura of Murder
traits.desc: As long as the reaper is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The reaper makes two dagger attacks and uses Shroud Self.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shroud Self
actions.desc: The reaper magically turns invisible until the start of its next turn. This invisibility ends if the reaper makes an attack roll, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

spells: The reaper's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Reflection
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The reflection can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the reflection can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the reflection has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

actions.name: Strength Drain
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new reflection rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

traits.name: Terror Frenzy (Fury Only)
traits.desc: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.

traits.name: Weight of Sorrow (Despair Only)
traits.desc: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Chilling Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel cold damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Day)
actions.desc: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth (Fear Only)
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the spirit takes the Hide action.

monsters.name: Skull Lasher of Myrkul

actions.desc: The skull lasher makes two attacks with its flail.

actions.name: Iron Skull Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the skull lasher's next turn.

actions.name: Ray of Sickness (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the skull lasher's next turn. If the skull lasher casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

spells: The skull lasher is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, protection from evil and good, ray of sickness (see "Actions" below), shield

monsters.name: Steel Defender
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Vigilant
traits.desc: The defender can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

actions.name: Force-Empowered Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. 1d8 + PB force damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day)
actions.desc: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore 2d8 + PB hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reactions.name: Deflect Attack
reactions.desc: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.

Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has charmed. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Charm
actions.desc:
One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only one target charmed at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

actions.name: Draining Kiss
actions.desc: The fiend kisses a creature charmed by it or a willing creature. The target must make a 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 (5d10 + 5) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.desc: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

monsters.name: Tiny Servant
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Incorporeal Passage (Ghostly Only)
traits.desc: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

traits.name: Festering Aura (Putrid Only)
traits.desc: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. 2d4 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage.

actions.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel slashing damage. If the target is poisoned, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The tree deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tree makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
actions.desc: The tree magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the tree. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the tree dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the tree takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

actions.name: Flame Seed
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 60 ft., one target you can see. 1d6 + PB fire damage.

actions.name: Fiery Teleportation
actions.desc: The spirit and each willing creature of your choice within 5 feet of it teleport up to 15 feet to unoccupied spaces you can see. Then each creature within 5 feet of the space that the spirit left must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or take 1d6 + PB fire damage.

monsters.name: Yuan-ti Malison (Type 1)

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Malison Type
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has one of the following types:

traits.name: Type 1:
traits.desc: Human body with snake head

traits.name: Type 2:
traits.desc: Human head and body with snakes for arms

traits.name: Type 3:
traits.desc: Human head and upper body with a serpentine lower body instead of legs

actions.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or two melee attacks, but can use its bite only once.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

spells: The yuan-ti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes two bite attacks using its snake arms.

spells: The yuan-ti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.name: Type 1:

traits.name: Type 2:
traits.desc: Human head and body with snakes for arms

traits.name: Type 3:

actions.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or two melee attacks, but can constrict only once.

actions.name: Bite (Snake Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

nested.callback: return `Kill one _${monster.name}_ for every ${monster.hp} damage dealt to the mob`
